title: LagReportBans
body:
Served 5x 5 min bans, 5x 10 min bans, now I have 20 min bans. all because in the odd game I lagged and had to restart to get into game. Have over 90% on your connection rating
Where is the real person I can report this too? not fair

replies.body:
You don't get LeaverBuster punishments for the odd dc. You have to afk/dc from quite a few games to even see a 5 minute LPQ.

Shit happens, everyone knows that, which is why the occasional leave won't be punished. At a point though, you (and Riot) have to consider the impact on other players. Every game you leave, intentionally or otherwise, negatively influences the experience of 9 other players. Riot can only give you so many free passes.

If you're having consistent connection troubles, it might be worth switching to ethernet/reducing interference/talking to your ISP. 

Scoring 90% on the connection rating isn't the be all and end all. Maybe your connection is unstable at certain times of day, or under certain loads, or with certain brick walls between you and your router.
